title: A Man with a problem
brief_description: Demonstrates psychological treatment of a chronic alcoholic patient. Conditioning with electric shock is used to develop aversion to alcohol in an experimental form of behavior therapy. Emphasises the need for cooperation of all involved with the patient and the complexity of the problem.
